message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you be willing to negotiate closer to that amount?
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective. While this product offers significant value, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $10,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am still unable to meet you at $10,000. I would like to propose $9,000 as my maximum offer.
Hi Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $9,500 is my final offer - I think that's a fair price that reflects the true value of this product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am willing to consider $9,200 as my maximum offer for the product.
Bob, you're very close. How about we split the difference and make it $9,350? This would be a win-win for both of us.
